Posts.Content: On Dec 01, 2011 6:06 PM mtnbiker wrote: Hi Maryelsa322, Thank you for replying:) Did you have chemo first? I am due to start chemo on monday for 12wks I am in a study at UCI irvine calif. after 4 wks of chemo they do a mri to see if tumor has shrunk, hopefully it will then I will continue for 4 more weeks...Then surgery after a month of no chemo.. It Is wonderful to hear a happy story...not many out there on TNBC. my tumor is grade 3..I am 51 and very active so hopefully, I can weather this storm... Any suggestions? again thanks sharing.... Missy Hi Missy, I was diagnosed with metaplastic breast cancer in Jan '08. I had a double mastectomy then chemo. My tumor was grade 3 also. I was 33 then and I am currently doing fine...praise God. Being active and eating right is definitely a plus for you. I will keep you in my prayers. Â
Posts.Title: triple negative breast cancer, metaplastic
